content:
# We have successfully crafted 2 stone furnaces, and they are now in our inventory along with the coal, iron ore, and stone. 
# The next step is to set up these furnaces to start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# Step 9: Place the stone furnaces in the environment.
for _ in range(2):
    place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Place each stone furnace in the environment.

# Step 10: Load the stone furnaces with coal and iron ore to begin smelting.
for furnace in get_entities(Prototype.StoneFurnace):
    insert_item(furnace, Prototype.Coal, quantity=5)  # Load 5 coal into each furnace.
    insert_item(furnace, Prototype.IronOre, quantity=5)  # Load 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# Step 11: Check the status of the furnaces to ensure they are smelting.
furnace_status = [inspect_entity(furnace) for furnace in get_entities(Prototype.StoneFurnace)]
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace_status}")  # Display the status of the furnaces.
